name: Tag Release Work Items-Modal-V1
description: Automatically add specified tag to all work items associated with build or release. Also includes filtering of workitems by regex
author: irfankhan

inputs.name: pipelineType
inputs.label: Specify type of pipeline
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify whether task is used for build or release

inputs.name: tagToAdd
inputs.label: Tag to add to work items
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a tag that will be added to work items

inputs.name: filterWorkItemsById
inputs.label: Filter work items by ID using regex format. Example: ^(1|2|3)$
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a list of work item IDs to filter work items for tagging. Use regex format to specify multiple IDs. Example: ^(1|2|3)$

inputs.name: enableAreaFiltering
inputs.label: Enable area filtering
inputs.helpMarkDown:
If you continue with area filtering the following rules are to be considered:
 1. If you specify only root area only work items from root area will be tagged 
 2. If you specify one of child area only work items for `rootArea\childArea` will be tagged

inputs.name: rootArea
inputs.label: Select the root area
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select the root area 

 Press refresh to load available areas

inputs.name: childArea
inputs.label: Child area for filtering tasks for tagging
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify a value of a child area field of work item to filter work items for tagging 

 Press refresh to load available areas 

 If doesn't specified tagging will be applied to all work items with root area value (previous input)
